answers.answer: Fast free track transfer and safe, free transportation via Moldova are available from the Ukrainian-Moldovan border to the Romanian border, primarily by buses to Huși.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The free track transfer operates via Moldova, with daily buses departing from the Palanca border in Moldova to the city Huși in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Anyone fleeing the war in Ukraine can use the free transportation services, regardless of their nationality.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The free transportation is supported by the UN Refugee Agency (UNHCR), the International Organization for Migration (IOM), and the Romanian and Moldavian governments.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Daily buses depart from the Palanca border in Moldova to the city Huși in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Free buses depart daily from the Palanca border in Moldova for Huși in Romania.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: The travel time for the free transportation journey from Palanca border to Huși is 5-6 hours.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: Upon arrival in Huși, if required, travelers can receive free medical care, water, and food.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.

answers.answer: From Huși, travelers can continue their journey within Romania by taking free buses to Bucharest or Iasi.
answers.instruction: Go to website https://dopomoha.ro/en/buses-from-ukraine and read the page carefully.
